pages.text: Decorations are various visually useful blocks. Some can also be interacted with or store items like chests do. You'll need a thingamajig or some components first to craft them. Usually crafted in the crafting table.

Components are the various crafting items that can be used to craft specific decorations, which was introduced to reduce clutter and button bugs in the stonecutter. Each component has a category that is defined for itself. The recipes for components are on the next few pages.
The most basic component of them all used in other components' creation.
Components not listed here are crafted in the smithing table or stonecutter.
Note that components actually are combined together in recipes to craft certain decorations, as decorations can fit into more than one category at once.
